name: Save your Penguin!
description:
Save your Penguin from killer whales!

Move with arrows, avoid the whales! 

This is CroPenguins NFT Game. You can adopt CroPenguins on Cronos Blockchain Network. There are 3,369 CroPenguins available!

Contact us via https://twitter.com/CroPenguins!
